actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the financing of parkways from the Highway Trust Funds, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the financing of parkways from the Highway Trust Fund. Provides that parkways funded under this Act shall be managed solely for scenic and recreational use and passenger car travel.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the financing of parkways from the Highway Trust Funds, and for other purposes.
